title: Under Construction!! Newly Remodeled 2 bedroom 1 bath
map_address: 1925 Santa Paula near St. Louis Ave.
posting_body: Newly Remodeled 2 bedroom 1 bath with a fresh interior and all new appliances waiting for you to call "HOME" .Why
This home features beautiful industrial Carpet and marble white/gray floor tiles throughout the home with a bright and airy bathroom and vanity area.
Brand new white cabinets and Granite countertops throughout the kitchen.
Modern ceiling fan installed in the living room.
The home also offers Climate controlled AC and Heater.
This Community is under New Management!
We are currently updating the courtyard and offer a convenient resident portal to submit rent payments, service requests, and communicate with management online.
The Community is steps away from the famous Las Vegas Strip, public transportation and restaurants.
Come on home to a lovely community with Magnolia Circle LLC.
